job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you an exceptional engineer eager to take charge, drive strategic influence, and conquer intricate technical challenges? Join us to develop pivotal product features while steering its technical trajectory, ensuring enduring stability and growth. Your technical choices will significantly influence both the product and its users, granting you the freedom to innovate and a duty to excel.

   You'll work on cutting-edge educational products:
     * TeachTap: Harnesses AI to animate historical figures in a dynamic, TikTok-inspired learning format.
     * TeachTales: Captivates students through personalized, enchanting storytelling that enhances understanding.
     * TimeBack: Functions as a learning assistant, seamlessly integrating with existing applications to provide proactive student coaching.
     * Athena: Delivers quantifiable academic results through AI-generated videos and tests.

   Your role involves guiding the technical progression of our products, ensuring they remain scalable, maintainable, and robust for the future. By working closely with product teams, you'll convert broad requirements into technical design decisions, tackling complex challenges while upholding high standards. Your choices will define the product's future and influence the educational paths of countless students.

   We emphasize strategic planning and initial design. Our AI-centric approach automates repetitive tasks, allowing you to concentrate on impactful decisions and problem-solving. Enjoy substantial autonomy and the opportunity to shape product direction, emphasizing long-term stability and scalability.

   If you're poised to lead the technical advancement of our SaaS offerings and utilize generative AI to explore new horizons, we invite you to connect with us.

   What you will be doing

     * Feature Development: Crafting and executing new features with a focus on scalability, maintainability, and long-term impact.
     * Requirement Engineering: Partnering with the product team to fine-tune requirements and spearheading technical discussions to align features with product objectives.
     * Operations and Maintenance: Ensuring product stability through monitoring, performance tuning, and proactive issue identification and resolution.
     * Technical Design: Making critical technical decisions that directly affect user experiences and the scalability of the product.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Jumping from one short-term project to another or pursuing the latest technology fad.
     * Working on internal IT systems or outsourced projects without tangible user impact.
     * Being bogged down by endless meetings or tedious infrastructure concerns.
job_details.full_text:
Lead Product Engineer, LearnwithAI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Are you an exceptional engineer eager to take charge, drive strategic influence, and conquer intricate technical challenges? Join us to develop pivotal product features while steering its technical trajectory, ensuring enduring stability and growth. Your technical choices will significantly influence both the product and its users, granting you the freedom to innovate and a duty to excel.

   You'll work on cutting-edge educational products:
     * TeachTap: Harnesses AI to animate historical figures in a dynamic, TikTok-inspired learning format.
     * TeachTales: Captivates students through personalized, enchanting storytelling that enhances understanding.
     * TimeBack: Functions as a learning assistant, seamlessly integrating with existing applications to provide proactive student coaching.
     * Athena: Delivers quantifiable academic results through AI-generated videos and tests.

   Your role involves guiding the technical progression of our products, ensuring they remain scalable, maintainable, and robust for the future. By working closely with product teams, you'll convert broad requirements into technical design decisions, tackling complex challenges while upholding high standards. Your choices will define the product's future and influence the educational paths of countless students.

   We emphasize strategic planning and initial design. Our AI-centric approach automates repetitive tasks, allowing you to concentrate on impactful decisions and problem-solving. Enjoy substantial autonomy and the opportunity to shape product direction, emphasizing long-term stability and scalability.

   If you're poised to lead the technical advancement of our SaaS offerings and utilize generative AI to explore new horizons, we invite you to connect with us.

   What you will be doing

     * Feature Development: Crafting and executing new features with a focus on scalability, maintainability, and long-term impact.
     * Requirement Engineering: Partnering with the product team to fine-tune requirements and spearheading technical discussions to align features with product objectives.
     * Operations and Maintenance: Ensuring product stability through monitoring, performance tuning, and proactive issue identification and resolution.
     * Technical Design: Making critical technical decisions that directly affect user experiences and the scalability of the product.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Jumping from one short-term project to another or pursuing the latest technology fad.
     * Working on internal IT systems or outsourced projects without tangible user impact.
     * Being bogged down by endless meetings or tedious infrastructure concerns.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and deployment of AI-centric educational products that utilize generative AI. Specific examples like 'TeachTap' (animating historical figures), 'TeachTales' (personalized storytelling), and 'Athena' (AI-generated videos and tests) directly align with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building user-facing applications powered by generative models. The role involves guiding technical progression, converting requirements into technical designs, and ensuring scalability and maintainability, which are key aspects of developing and deploying GenAI solutions. The mention of 'generative AI to explore new horizons' further solidifies this classification.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Feature Development: Crafting and executing new features with a focus on scalability, maintainability, and long-term impact,' and 'Technical Design: Making critical technical decisions that directly affect user experiences and the scalability of the product.' This aligns with building and integrating AI features into user-facing applications.

The phrase 'Technical Design: Making critical technical decisions that directly affect user experiences and the scalability of the product' points to the software engineering aspect of defining how features are built and integrated.

The role involves 'Requirement Engineering: Partnering with the product team to fine-tune requirements and spearheading technical discussions to align features with product objectives.' This demonstrates understanding business needs and translating them into technical plans.

The description states 'Operations and Maintenance: Ensuring product stability through monitoring, performance tuning, and proactive issue identification and resolution.' This directly relates to maintaining and ensuring the smooth operation of deployed systems.

The job description highlights working on 'cutting-edge educational products' that 'Harnesses AI to animate historical figures,' 'personalized, enchanting storytelling,' and 'AI-generated videos and tests.' These are all applications of generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Harnesses AI to animate historical figures

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'personalized, enchanting storytelling that enhances understanding' implies the use and development of generative models for content creation.
The product 'Athena' which 'Delivers quantifiable academic results through AI-generated videos and tests' directly points to the application of generative AI for content creation and assessment.
The overall emphasis on 'AI-centric approach' and 'utilize generative AI to explore new horizons' indicates a core focus on generative modeling techniques.
